title: Dissecting the transcriptome landscape of the human hippocampus
abstract: Here we performed single-nucleus transcriptomic analysis of human hippocampus across the lifespan by split-seq approach
overall_design: Single-nucleus RNA-seq was performed using SPLiT-seq. Taking the advantage of the SPLiT-seq platform, we were able to pool multiple samples together for a run to reduce batch effects. Gene expression data of each individual sample could be demultiplexed and sorted out using provided barcodes.
summary: Here we performed single-nucleus transcriptomic analysis of human hippocampus across the lifespan by split-seq approach
